body.name: SYLVOX 15.6" Flip-Down TV for Under Cabinet, 12-Volt Small TV with 90-Degree Rotation, Digital Noise Reduction, and Storage Design for Kitchen, Bedroom, RV, and Yacht
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 5 hrs 23 mins
features: Flap-Down Kitchen TV: Tailored for the kitchen, this flat screen TV boasts a screen that can rotate horizontally ±45 degrees and vertically 0-90 degrees—whether mounted under the cabinet, facing front, or rear. The storage-friendly design adds a touch of elegance while saving precious space in your kitchen.

Exceptional Viewing Experience: Enjoy stunning visuals with the 1080p Full HD under-cabinet TV. Its 178°H/178°V ultra-wide viewing angle, high-performance 16:9 aspect ratio LCD panel, and 8-bit color panel with 16.7 million colors deliver an unparalleled picture experience.

Robust Protection Features: The under-counter TV screen is equipped with tempered glass protection to prevent scratches. Supporting DC 12V/AC 110V, it provides flexibility for usage in various environments without compromising durability.

Enhanced Functionality: The Mini fold-down TV integrates an ASTC tuner and supports ARC & CEC. Easy to install, it comes with a bracket and adapter, allowing you to connect devices supporting app downloads for internet movies and programs.

Versatile Placement: Ideal for both travel and home use, this small under counter TV is suitable for kitchens, trailers, RVs, bedrooms, lounges, and more. With dual rear cabinet speakers delivering reduced distortion and excellent broadband sound effects, it ensures an immersive audiovisual experience.
body.description: SYLVOX Kitchen TV transforms your culinary space into an entertainment hub. 1. Enjoy your favorite TV programs, whether it's breakfast or dinner. Catch up on TV news, watch live games, and explore new cooking techniques on the small TV, turning the cooking process into an enjoyable experience. 2. The flap-down TV supports ARC & CEC functions, allowing seamless connectivity to devices that support app downloads. Enjoy thrilling internet programs on your Kitchen TV. 3. User-friendly design featuring touch buttons and a mount. The screen is adjustable horizontally (±45 degrees), under the cabinet, and can rotate 0-90 degrees at the front and rear. When not in use, fold it upward for space-saving storage, ensuring your kitchen remains clutter-free. 4. Choose between top storage installation or wall mount for easy setup. 5. This Mini 12Volt TV isn't limited to the kitchen, RV, or other small rooms. The storage-friendly design adds a touch of elegance while saving precious space in your small rooms. It supports DC voltage 12V or can be connected to a home AC voltage 110v using the included adapter. The TV set includes a 100-240V adapter (12v car power cable not included). 6. For compact living spaces, this 12v TV is an excellent choice—low power, energy-efficient, storage design, easy to install, and displaying crystal-clear 1080P Full HD TV programs. Specifications: Viewing Angle Degree(H/V): H:178°, V:178° Aspect Ratio: 16:9 Video Input: ATV/DTV Power Consumption: <16W TV System: ATSC & NTSC Ports: Earphone, DC, CEC & ARC*1, PC Audio, AV, TV, RF, Coaxial, USB AC 100-240V, DC 12V, Weight: 3.7 lb Product Dimensions without stand: L/H/W: 14.28 x 8.76 x 1.40 inches Operating Temperature: -4°F to 113°F (-20°C to 45°C)

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Transform your kitchen into a lively hub of joy with SYLVOX mini TV. Elevate your dining experience by catching your favorite TV shows during breakfast or dinner. Stay updated with the latest news, watch live sports, and discover new cooking techniques—all on SYLVOX under cabinet TV. Cooking is no longer a chore, but a delightful experience! The fold-down TV comes with ARC & CEC functions for seamless connectivity to devices supporting app downloads. Dive into thrilling internet programs right in your kitchen. Our user-friendly design boasts touch buttons and a convenient mount. The screen is horizontally adjustable (±45 degrees) under the cabinet and can rotate 0-90 degrees at the front and rear. When not in use, simply fold it upward for space-saving storage, ensuring a clutter-free kitchen. Opt for top storage installation or wall mount for a hassle-free setup that suits your preferences.

Elevate your kitchen with under-cabinet TV—perfect for compact spaces Effortlessly store the flip-down TV in an upward position, seamlessly blending it with your surroundings. Its hidden design is both simple and elegant, ensuring it doesn't encroach on your kitchen space. If you're considering adding a small TV to your tiny house, this 15.6‘’ flip down TV is the ideal choice for a sleek and space-saving solution. Immerse yourself in quality family time with the under-counter TV Whether you're watching food shows together or honing your cooking skills, transform meal preparation into a relaxing and enjoyable experience for everyone. Flip-Down Kitchen TV This flat-screen marvel rotates ±45 degrees and flips 90 degrees, offering a wide 178°/178° view. No matter where you install it, enjoy crystal-clear TV content from any angle.

12 Volt TV, suitable for most scenarios. Enhance any space, be it a kitchen, bedroom, RV, or yacht, with the SYLVOX 12V TV, seamlessly blending into your surroundings for a more aesthetically pleasing home environment. Versatility at its best! The small 12 Volt TV transcends beyond just the kitchen, RV, or confined spaces. The storage-friendly design not only adds a touch of elegance but also conserves valuable space in your smaller rooms. It supports DC voltage 12V and can be effortlessly connected to home AC voltage 110V using the included adapter. The TV set comes complete with a 100-240V adapter (12v car power cable not included). Embrace modern connectivity with ARC & CEC functions, facilitating seamless pairing with devices supporting app downloads. Immerse yourself in thrilling internet programs right from the comfort of your room. Tailored for compact living, The RV TV is a top choice—low power consumption, energy-efficient, storage-friendly design, easy installation, and boasting crystal-clear 1080P Full HD TV programs.

Experience the brilliance of 1080P Full HD TV with high-definition LCD TV Boasting a 1920 x 1080 resolution, this full high-definition LCD TV features an ELED backlight, ensuring a slim and lightweight body design. The high-performance 16:9 aspect ratio LCD panel, combined with an 8-bit color panel offering 16.7 million colors, delivers a stunning visual experience for your enjoyment. Effortlessly link up your smart devices with the under-cabinet TV With ARC & CEC functions, it seamlessly connects to devices supporting app downloads, letting you relish thrilling internet programs right in your Caravan. Easy to install Simplify your setup with SYLVOX TV—easy to install with two mounting options: hanging and wall mounting. Just attach the provided TV bracket with three screws, and your TV is ready to use. The versatile TV bracket supports both fixed and swivel mounting, allowing you to customize your TV installation effortlessly.

You can install it where you want, either for home use or commercial use. Specifications: Viewing Angle Degree(H/V): H:178°, V:178° Aspect Ratio: 16:9 Video Input: ATV/DTV Power Consumption: <16W TV System: ATSC & NTSC Ports: Earphone, DC, CEC & ARC*1, PC Audio, AV, TV, RF, Coaxial, USB AC 100-240V, DC 12V, Weight: 3.7 lb Product Dimensions without stand: L/H/W: 14.28 x 8.76 x 1.40 inches Operating Temperature: -4°F to 113°F (-20°C to 45°C)
